website_summaries.verdict: A wireless doorbell sensor with adjustable alarm tone and volume. Known for accuracy and reliability. The best choice on the market.
pros: An economical alternative to a pricey home security system
a buffet of alarm tone choices
cons: A bit on the expensive side, but well worth the extra cost

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor motion detection
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to detect my cats at the door, works perfectly for detecting people and animals. The sensors are NOT water proof or outside proof, INDOOR USE ONLY.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Sowers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: This works well to notify you that the sensor has been tripped. Be careful not to place it in intense sunlight, as this can send false notifications. I do not agree with other reports that the alarm is not loud enough, I have had no issues hearing the alarm on the highest volume setting. Excellent product for the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought it would be annoying, as I didn't want the bell to ring ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it would be annoying, as I didn't want the bell to ring all day as we went in and out, but now I just plug the indoor piece in at night, or anytime there is reason I want to be alerted and it is perfect. It doesn't alarm me but just gives me notice. Affordable, simple, and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it worked very well as a door open alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sado Tech wireless
customer_reviews.text: very nice product , i have in my office and my home
customer_reviews.author: FRUSTRATED Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Affordable and super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Affordable and super easy to use. I've set it up as in inside burglar alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. Easy to install and program
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Easy to install and program. Great price. Will buy another set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick setup
customer_reviews.text: Works great! sets up in minutes! very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Goosen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive warning system. We use it for 2 entryways. Nice and effective system. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: helps when Amazon Logics does not ring the doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Only criticism is that I would like to have is a longer time delay between alarms when someone stands at the door, 7 seconds or so is too short to get to the door.
customer_reviews.author: AZOldGuy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware. Quality is not up to standard!!
customer_reviews.text: After received the package, I put one sensor unit with batteries to test first, then tried USB power. It work ok. After 1 month when I take 2nd unit to deploy and use USB power, that unit ***FAILED***. Only batteries can be used. I can't return this defective (2nd) unit and am stuck with it. Quality is not up to standard, so buyer be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Jpw

customer_reviews.title: I had to return the product,... ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the product, . . . apparently others were able to make it work for them, . . . I could not.
customer_reviews.author: dwight55

customer_reviews.title: It is a wireless doorbell.... I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a wireless doorbell.... I don't need 52 ring tones I only want it to go "ding dong" when motion is detected. The motion sensors are weak! Has trouble sensing motion from anything farther than 2 feet away. SadoTech should spend less r&d on ringtones and more on detecting motion.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scholten

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Weak signal that does not like passing through walls. Works well in open spaces.
customer_reviews.author: TonyG

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend looking for a better product then this
customer_reviews.text: Product has been spotty. The receiver is about 50 feet from the transmitters. I've had this product for 6 months and it rang about 80% of the time. Now the receiver doesn't work at all. I called their customer support team and I couldn't get anyone on the phone. I would recommend looking for a better product then this.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: works but not the best for outside
customer_reviews.text: the sun sets it off all the time. not ideal for outside.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Contacted them but got no intelligent or helpful response
customer_reviews.text: One sensor DOA. The stuff is trash and SadoTech provides no customer service. Contacted them but got no intelligent or helpful response.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: One motion sensor is ok. The other one goes off constantly, even with zero movement around it. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: boomquest

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This unit rings when there is no movement around it. It goes off every 3 to 5 minutes. Unless there is a fix for this, we will need to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mayjar

customer_reviews.title: Ours quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Worked in a very inconsistent way for a couple of weeks and then quit completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STOP selling garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Made in China. Shop elsewhere. By the time you figure out it is not working you are out of the 30 satisfaction guarantee and you will need to file a claim with your credit cards for a Charge back to the seller. Such a hastel. STOP selling garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Aware.

customer_reviews.title: One Worked in a very inconsistent way for one week ...
customer_reviews.text: One Worked in a very inconsistent way for one week and then quit completely, the other come without the usb port.
customer_reviews.author: Waredskin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work properly. Most of the time doesn't give any sign.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product a little sensitive to motion but that is ...
customer_reviews.text: great product a little sensitive to motion but that is what they are supposed to do, 3 stars because the batteries run out pretty quick with this item and the ringer cant be that far away from the sensors, but over all not bad construction easy to use and a huge variety of ringers that come on the device. i use the from security around my boat!
customer_reviews.author: matthew baver

product_meta.title: SadoTech Wireless Passive Infrared Dual (2) Motion Sensor Doorbell, Short Reset Delay (1-5 sec), LED Lights, 25-feet Sensor Range with 50+ Chimes
feature_bullets: Configurable flashing LED light indicators. One red LED is for low power battery indicator. Three blue LEDs are motion detection indicators

Two configurable motion sensor trigger modes: 1) Very short 1-2 second delay in between motion triggers [continuous triggering and doorbell ringing if motion is detected continuously] 2) 5-8 second delay in between motion triggers (after first motion trigger and doorbell ring there will be a 5-8 second pause until the next motion detection is available). NOTE: Motion sensors can be very sensitive and slight movements can trigger the alert.
Motion sensor unit can be powered by two options 1) with 2 x AAA batteries (not included) or 2) with micro USB cable (not included)

Over 50+ different ring tones. Four levels of adjustable volume from 25db to 110db. Operating range of over 500 feet (between sensor and main chime unit). Receiver easily plugs into an electrical outlet (no batteries required). Includes 1 plugin receiver unit and 2 motion sensor, anchors, screws, and mounting bracket for motion sensor.
